def load_train(path="./dataset/train_data.pkl"):
    return torch.load(path)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
noisy_imgs_1 , noisy_imgs_2 = load_train()
noisy_img_1 = noisy_imgs_1[0]
assert len(noisy_img_1.shape) == 3
noisy_img_1.shape

torch.Size([3, 32, 32])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
noisy_img_2 = noisy_imgs_2[0]
assert len(noisy_img_2.shape) == 3
noisy_img_2.shape

torch.Size([3, 32, 32])
{% endraw %}
